info.title: Microblink
info.description: Microblinkâ€™s AI-powered technology eliminates the need to type in personal data from identity documents. Use Microblink Connector as an API proxy for BlinkID Web API SaaS to get four different actions that extract data from identity documents.

post.summary: Scan the front side of ID documents
post.description: Extract data from the front side of the identity document.

post.summary: Scan front and back side of ID documents
post.description: Extract data from both sides of the identity documents.

post.summary: Scan ID documents that contain an MRZ
post.description: Extract encoded data from the MRZ found on the identity documents.

post.summary: Scan ID documents that contain a barcode
post.description: Extract data from a barcode found on the identity documents.
